title: once more, with feeling from Alan Cristea Gallery Twentieth Anniversary Portfolio
medium: Etching with embossing from a portfolio of three aquatints (one with carborundum relief), one carborundum relief, one chromogenic color print, three digital prints, four etchings (two with chine collé, one with embossing), one linoleum cut, one lithograph, three screenprints, two woodcuts, and two polymer gravures (one with woodcut)
credits: Gift of Alan Cristea Gallery, London, in honor of Alan Cristea
